name: Backseat Warrior
description:
You plays as Harvey, one half of an escaped lab experiment attempting to fight his way to freedom. Meanwhile, his conjoined head Mike will offer opinions on what powerups, weapons, and items you should take. Mike does not like to be told "no."

- Rogue-lite style runs, with different weapons and powerups to acquire

- Innovative "drag along an annoying companion" mechanic

- Multiple different enemies to fight

- Unique art style
